summary: This is an email from attorney Joseph DiPiero of Akin Gump to the SDNY, transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. It includes a cover letter and updated production index.

persons.name: Joseph DiPiero
persons.context: Attorney from Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP who sent the email transmitting Deutsche Bank's document production to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

persons.name: Parvin Moyne
persons.context: Attorney at Akin Gump who was copied on the email regarding Deutsche Bank's document production to the SDNY.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: Attorney at Akin Gump who was copied on the email regarding Deutsche Bank's document production to the SDNY.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The SDNY issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, likely as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's finances.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its attorneys at Akin Gump, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in response to the July 2019 subpoena.

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was responding to a subpoena from the SDNY dated July 11, 2019, indicating an active financial investigation related to the Epstein case.
The law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP was representing Deutsche Bank in this matter.
The production included an updated index and was transmitted via a secure file-sharing link, suggesting a large volume of sensitive documents.
